text: Colus stimpsoni, common name the Stimpson's colus, is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Buccinidae, the true whelks. ==Description== ==Distribution== The species has been found dwelling in the Bay of Fundy; in Canada and various other gulfs situate about the western shores of northern America. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Buccinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1868
title: Colus stimpsoni
